(Simplified: 骤)
Pictophonetic: 聚 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.

humanum_full_description_en:
From " horse " to " gathering " sound. The original meaning is horses sprinting. "Said the text": "Suddenly, the horse is quick to step. From the horse, gather the sound." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Four Males": "Drive the other four camels, and set up a sudden Qinqin." "Han Feizi. The Foreign Reserve said that the lower right": "Father the four horses, rush to deal with the horses." It also refers to animals sprinting. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Qi Wu Lun": "Mao Qiang and Li Ji are as beautiful as a person; a fish sees deep, a bird sees flying high, and an elk sees a decision."

" Suddenly " means swift and rapid. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Eighteenth Years of Cheng Gong": "Bo Qi suddenly moved to the Jin Dynasty and asked to faint." "Lao Zi. Chapter Twenty-Three": "Therefore, the wind will never end, and the shower will not end all day."

" Suddenly " means repeated or multiple times. Such as "Mandarin. "Jin Yu": "The spirit of the public abused, Zhao Xuanzi suddenly admonished, the public troubled it, and the thief made it." "Lu Shi Chunqiu. Shiwei: "Sudden victory in a sudden battle is the blessing of the country."

" Sudden " said suddenly. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Du Fu's "Rain": "Suddenly I saw the floating gorge and came across the river in secret."
humanum_short_description_en: From " horse " to " gathering " sound. The original meaning is horses sprinting.
humanum_full_description:
從「馬」，「聚」聲。本義是馬匹疾走。《說文》：「驟，馬疾步也。从馬，聚聲。」如《詩．小雅．四牡》：「駕彼四駱，載驟駸駸。」《韓非子．外儲說右下》：「造父御四馬，馳驟周旋而恣欲於馬。」又泛指動物疾走。如《莊子．齊物論》：「毛嬙、麗姬，人之所美也；魚見之深入，鳥見之高飛，麋鹿見之決驟。」

　　「驟」表示迅速、急速。如《左傳．成公十八年》：「杞伯於是驟朝于晉而請為昏。」《老子．第二十三章》：「故飄風不終朝，驟雨不終日。」

　　「驟」表示屢次、多次。如《國語．晉語》：「靈公虐，趙宣子驟諫，公患之，使鉏麑賊之。」《呂氏春秋．適威》：「驟戰而驟勝，國家之福也。」

　　「驟」還表示突然。如唐代杜甫〈雨〉：「驟看浮峽過，密作渡江來。」
humanum_short_description: 從「馬」，「聚」聲。本義是馬匹疾走。

Chinese: Humans take a stroll but when horses assemble they have a trot together.
Meaning: trot
Hanzi: 骤
Story: When horses assemble for a party, looking sexy is all about how they trot.
Kind: traditional

從「 馬 」，「 聚 」聲。本義是馬匹疾走。《說文》：「驟，馬疾步也。从馬，聚聲。」如《詩．小雅．四牡》：「駕彼四駱，載驟駸駸。」《韓非子．外儲說右下》：「造父御四馬，馳驟周旋而恣欲於馬。」又泛指動物疾走。如《莊子．齊物論》：「毛嬙、麗姬，人之所美也；魚見之深入，鳥見之高飛，麋鹿見之決驟。」 「 驟 」表示迅速、急速。如《左傳．成公十八年》：「杞伯於是驟朝于晉而請為昏。」《老子．第二十三章》：「故飄風不終朝，驟雨不終日。」 「 驟 」表示屢次、多次。如《國語．晉語》：「靈公虐，趙宣子驟諫，公患之，使鉏麑賊之。」《呂氏春秋．適威》：「驟戰而驟勝，國家之福也。」 「 驟 」還表示突然。如唐代杜甫〈雨〉：「驟看浮峽過，密作渡江來。」
From " horse" to " gathering" sound. The original meaning is horses sprinting. "Said the text": "Suddenly, the horse is quick to step. From the horse, gather the sound." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Four Males": "Drive the other four camels, and set up a sudden Qinqin." "Han Feizi. The Foreign Reserve said that the lower right": "Father the four horses, rush to deal with the horses." It also refers to animals sprinting. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Qi Wu Lun": "Mao Qiang and Li Ji are as beautiful as a person; a fish sees deep, a bird sees flying high, and an elk sees a decision." " Suddenly" means swift and rapid. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Eighteenth Years of Cheng Gong": "Bo Qi suddenly moved to the Jin Dynasty and asked to faint." "Lao Zi. Chapter Twenty-Three": "Therefore, the wind will never end, and the shower will not end all day." " Suddenly" means repeated or multiple times. Such as "Mandarin. "Jin Yu": "The spirit of the public abused, Zhao Xuanzi suddenly admonished, the public troubled it, and the thief made it." "Lu Shi Chunqiu. Shiwei: "Sudden victory in a sudden battle is the blessing of the country." " Sudden" said suddenly. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Du Fu's "Rain": "Suddenly I saw the floating gorge and came across the river in secret."

驟字的基本解释

驟
zhòu
见“骤”。

驟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhòu］
［《廣韻》鋤祐切，去宥，崇。］
“骤1”的繁体字。“騶3”的被通假字。
(1)马疾走；马奔驰。
(2)指奔走，急行。
(3)使马奔驰，纵辔。
(4)疾速；急速而猛；急促。
(5)指急匆匆，匆忙。
(6)指急速动荡。
(7)副词。屡次。
(8)副词。突然。

驟字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驟； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1446第21
【廣韻】鉏祐切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】鉏救切，?音縐。【玉篇】奔也。【說文】馬疾步也。【詩·小雅】載驟駸駸。【註】小曰馳，不馳而小疾曰驟。又凡疾速曰驟。　又數也。【左傳·襄十一年】晉能驟來。【註】晉以諸?之師，更番而出，故能數來。　又【集韻】才候切，音㔌。義同。　又叶逡須切，音趨。【淮南子·原道訓】縱志舒節，以馳大區，可以步而步，可以驟而驟。　又叶縱遇切，疽去聲。【桓麟七說】輪不暇轉，足不及驟。騰虛踰浮，瞥若飆霧。　本作?。
